summary: Build a music artist website using real data, where an admin can upload/manage content and public users can view it, with optional user accounts (login/signup) and user plans/subscriptions.
architectural_notes: User requested admin-panel authentication via username/email/phone + password (credential-based login), which may conflict with the existing Internet Identity–based admin authorization approach.

existing_features.title: Add admin authorization to the backend so that only a configured admin Principal can perform upload/manage operations. Admin identity must be verified via Internet Identity login on the frontend and enforced by the backend on every admin-only method.

Create a public, read-only frontend for the music artist website with pages/sections for Home, Music/Releases, Videos, Shows, and Gallery, all powered by live data fetched from the backend (React Query).

Create an admin-only dashboard UI that allows the admin to upload/manage content: edit artist profile, add/edit/remove releases/tracks, videos, shows, and gallery items. Upload/manage actions must call backend admin-only methods and update the public pages after changes.

Apply a cohesive visual theme for the artist brand across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and components) with a distinct style that fits a music artist portfolio. Avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Add generated static image assets (logo + hero background) and render them in the frontend from static files under frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve these images through the backend).

Implement first-class end-user accounts using the existing Internet Identity authentication so that a visitor can (a) sign up by logging in for the first time and (b) log in/out on subsequent visits, with clear user-facing copy that differentiates “Create account” (first-time) vs “Login” (returning) while still using Internet Identity under the hood.

Create a dedicated user onboarding flow that triggers after Internet Identity login when the caller does not yet have a saved user profile, prompting the user to complete required signup fields (at minimum: display name) and saving them via the backend.

Add frontend UI for user plans: show a “Plans” experience where an authenticated user can view available plans (tiers) and select/change their plan, with success/error feedback and React Query cache invalidation so the UI updates immediately.

Extend the existing admin dashboard to include a “Plans” management section that lets the admin create, edit, and delete user plans (tiers) and keeps the rest of the site responsive by invalidating/refetching affected queries after changes.

Update the Home page social link buttons to better support “social media app links” and “streaming” links by rendering platform-specific buttons (icon + platform name/label) instead of the generic “Follow” label, while still using the existing `artistProfile.socials: [Text]` URLs as the data source.

Update the Music/Releases page streaming link buttons to render platform-specific buttons (icon + platform name/label) derived from each `release.streamingLinks` URL instead of the generic “Listen” label, so users can easily recognize each streaming destination.

Update the Admin Dashboard unauthenticated/loading gate so it no longer shows an indefinite “Loading...” screen when the user is not logged in. Instead, show an explicit Admin login screen that tells the user to log in using Internet Identity (via the existing site Login button) to access the admin dashboard.

Add clear English guidance on the Admin Dashboard access control model: admin access is granted only to the Internet Identity Principal configured as admin, and the app must not support (or collect) username/email/phone + password login for admin access.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a music artist website powered by real data/content
Admin upload-only capability for managing site content (restricted to admin)
Public user-facing pages to view artist content (read-only for users)

Implement backend data models and storage for a music artist website using persisted (non-mock) content, including: artist profile (name, bio, socials), releases/tracks (title, date, cover image reference, streaming links), videos (title, platform link), shows/events (date, venue, city, ticket link), and gallery items (image reference + caption). Expose query methods for public read access and update methods for admin-only create/update/delete.
Add end-user authentication (signup/login) and user plans (e.g., subscription/tiers) to the site

Add backend data models and persisted storage for “user plans” (tiers) and per-user plan assignments, including admin-only CRUD for plans and authenticated-user methods to view available plans and set/change their own selected plan.
Add social media and streaming platform link buttons (e.g., socials + streaming links) to the artist site
Add admin panel login using credentials (username/email/phone + password) instead of/alongside Internet Identity for admin access

projectName: Music artist website with admin-only uploads and public read-only viewing
